entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Having issue with svg files #4361
  • API Docs - reconcile code comment docs with existing forms docs #4359
    .NET 7
  • App crashes in Release configuration #4358
    6.0.200-preview.13
  • [Inconsistency] Blazor Android Webview link with `_blank` target opens in current webview instead of new window #4357
  • Calling ClearValue if a color is null on WinUI is incorrect behavior #4356
  • Validate and review the changes required for the iOS NFloat #4353
  • X509Certificate Algorithm 'RC2' is not supported on this platform #4352
  • OnIdiom markup extension gets the Windows form factor wrong #4351
  • OnPlatform markup extension defines properties for platforms no longer supported #4350
  • Clean removal of previous versions of MAUI when a new one is installed #4344
  • XamlG Errors need to be surfaced more clearly #4343
  • Splash Screen does not resize(Scaling Issue) #4341
  • Appicon cannot be changed #4340

Closed

  • VS17.1Prv1: Maui default solution loads of errors #3421
  • [WinUI] Convert TabbedRenderer to an implementation of IViewHandler #3955
  • Clean up the namespaces #3101
    6.0.200-preview.11
  • [Spec] Rebuild TabbedPage On WinUI against NavigationView instead of Pivot #2796
    6.0.200-preview.11
  • XPlat Page Lifecycle #1721
    6.0.200-preview.12
  • iOS App Crashes if Hyperlink is Clicked in MAUI Blazor Project - NullReferenceException #3474
  • Service is not registered for AuthenticationStateProvider in AddBlazorWebView - WPF BlazorWebView #3580
  • [Bug] Code only throws exception inside Http DelegatingHandler in .NET MAUI Blazor #1690
  • Accessing Local Storage inside `DelegatingHandler` in Blazor Server and .NET MAUI Blazor #2547

PullRequests

Created

  • WinUI TabbedPage Tests/Cleanup/BarBackground #4360
  • [android] update built-in AOT profile #4355
  • Adding API diffs to the build #4354
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, 6.0.200-preview.13
  • [iOS] Add pending events in EntryHandler #4347
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮
  • Add pending Picker events and notify items collection changes #4346
    area/controls 🎮
  • [iOS] Add pending events and dismiss keyboard button to EditorHandler #4345
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮
  • GraphicsView Touches - Alternate API #4342

Merged

  • [Android] Changes to reduce unnecessary layout requests #4229
    area/layout 🔲, platform/android 🤖, partner
  • Support opening a new window in iOS Blazor WebView #4268
    area/blazor 🕸️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #4339
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [iOS, Android, Windows] Implement Border properties in ImageButton #3641
    area/controls 🎮
  • Update Maui.Graphics #4301

Updated

  • Improvements Droid Lifecycle #2669
    area/lifecycle 🔁, community ✨, 6.0.200-preview.13
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄, 6.0.200-preview.13
  • Essentials: Port xamarin/Essentials#1760 #2763
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨, 6.0.200-preview.13
  • [Catalyst] Fix OnPlatform on macOS #3763
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/Xaml </>, do-not-merge, 6.0.200-preview.13
  • Add drag-drop item reordering to CollectionView #3767 #3768
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/collectionview 📃, 6.0.200-preview.13
  • Add xplat OpenMauiAsset extension method #4323
  • [iOS] Implement VerticalTextAlignment property in Label #3714
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮
  • Move Xaml.VisualDiagnostics to Maui.Core #4333
    partner/ui-tools
  • Implement touch events in GraphicsView #3261
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/drawing ✏️
  • Implement InputView IsSpellCheckEnabled property #3729
    area/controls 🎮
